s: My husband does not suffer from ... Poland Spring water, which when I'm having acid issues, only adds to the pain. I wish I could get a gallon jug or something that could last me a moth that is more cost effective. This water isn't cheap, which I completely understand due to sourcing, logistics, etc., but I've tried so many other "alkaline" water brands that fall far from whay you offer. I'm on the fence of asking my husand if we can move to Iceland so I can have ...
